# eye2color

Python package and CLI for the Wuhan Jingce EYE2-400 Color Analyzer (MES,1).

## Installation
```bash
pip install eye2color
```

## Usage
```bash
eye2color --port COM3 --format csv --output data.csv
```

## Development
```bash
git clone https://github.com/ughstudios/eye2color.git
cd eye2color
pip install -e .
```
